description: This source file contains functions for generating JSON-RPC API headers, classes, enums, version info, and stubs based on a given schema. It handles code generation tasks for a JSON-RPC interface, supporting both auto and manual modes, with filename and directory management, and logging.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a JSON-RPC API header file, including necessary headers and a header comment.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function for parsing schema and generating JSON-RPC related code (headers, enums, version info, stubs, RPC implementations) based on configuration flags.

methods.name: _ParseJsonRpcSchema(schema)
methods.description: Internal helper to extract interface info and create a JsonRpcSchema object from the schema.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
